10163000.<attr><feel_normal_lv2><end_attr>「プクランド大:
It is said that somewhere in the Pukuland Continent, there are sometimes very sweet and fragrant fruits called Pukuberries. However,
they are very hard to find because monsters eat them right after they are harvested, so they are said to be a phantom fruit. The
Megistris Queen from Orphea also loved the scent of Pukuberries and used to carry them around with her as perfume.

Hey, you, 6, do you know where the Dangdang are? 5. Oh, Robbin' Ood Gang, or Dan Dan-dan for short. I'm crazy about their leader, Mr.

40280.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr><icon_ex:

40272.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「イエス！ その:

40284.「バロさまが ギックリ腰で かわいそうだから\n お見舞い用に とっておきの料理:

take care of him a lot!

40285.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「あなた プクプ:
You, Puk Puk Peach. That's exactly what I mean! Yes! I can cook a year's worth of special dishes with all the Puk Puk peaches I
bought up and the ones you brought! I'm rich, you know. That's why I bought up all the Pukupuku Peach in Orphea! I'm sure this will
cheer up Mr. Baro! We're getting married soon, that's for sure! Here we go! This is for you! Please accept this!

40286.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「料理ができたら:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>When I'm done cooking, I'll go to Dan Dan's
well and cuddle with him a lot! Wait for me!
My dearest Baro!

40287.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「イエス！ あた:
Yes! I can make enough of the best food for a year with all the puk-puk peaches I've bought up and the rest you've brought! And when I'm
done cooking, I'm going to go to Dan's Well and give him a big hug! I'll be waiting for you! My dearest Baro!

40288.「ふ～。あなたが持ってきた分と あたしが\n 買い占めた分の プクプクピーチを使:
Hmmm... I'm cooking with the amount of Pukupuku Peach you brought and the amount I bought up, but it's a lot and it's taking a
long time. But I might have done something wrong. Maybe there are people who are in trouble because Pukupuku Peach has disappeared
from the town.

40289.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「なんて ついてない:
How unlucky I am. Ugh. Listen to this. Listen to this horrifying incident! I'm actually a cook. It is said that there is no one in town
who can make a dish using Pukupuku Peach better than me. I went to buy some Pukupuku Peach to make a dish I am proud of. But...! Of
course, no matter where I went to buy them, they were all sold out and I couldn't get any more! What a terrible thing! If I can't make
that dish, I don't have the confidence to make it as a chef. Ah, it's hopeless. I'm in despair. Is this a sign from God that I should
stop being a chef? You think so too, don't you?

40296.「おお。やってくれるのですね。\n その気持ちは ありがたいのですが……。\n<:
Oh. You are going to do it, aren't you? I appreciate the sentiment, but... It seems that you have a lot of other people asking you for

40297.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「うう……。仕方あり:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>Ugh. It can't be helped. I guess it is my

40292.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「そうですか……。で:

I can't make it? Ah. It's hopeless.

40293.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「そうですよね。私も:
<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>Yes, I think so. I think so too. But if I quit
my job as a cook, what kind of location should
I change to?

40294.<icon_exc>「……そうか！ はっはっは！\n なんで 気がつかなかったん:
I see! Haha! Why didn't I notice that? I'm going to be a priest! I heard God's voice telling me it was time to fulfill my childhood

Water can be obtained by defeating <%sev_que_name0> in Muruel Forest. Can you do that for me?

40295.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「おお！ やって:
Oh! You are going to do it, aren't you? To meet someone who is willing to help me, it seems I am destined to become a priest after
all.

40290.「おお。やってくれるのですね。\n その気持ちは ありがたいのですが……。\n<:

40291.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「うう……。仕方あり:

40298.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「おお！ 戻って:

40299.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「おお！ やって:

40300.「得意の料理が 作れなくなったぐらいで\n 落ちこんでるなんて 主人ったら\n:
It's really pathetic for a master to be depressed just because he can't cook his favorite dish anymore. I think it would be
better if he had a more positive outlook on things. But I guess that's not possible.

40301.「神秘の水は ミュルエルの森にいる\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>を 倒す:
Sacred Water can be obtained by defeating
<%sev_que_name0> in Muruel Forest.<open_irai><bw_break>

40302.「神父になるために 洗礼を行いますので\n 神秘の水を 持ってきてください。\n:
I am baptizing you to become a priest, so
please bring Sacred Water with you. Thank you
very much.

40303.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「料理人をやめて:
I wondered what you were going to do when you quit being a cook, but I didn't expect you to want to be a priest. I'm beyond stunned. I'm
beyond stunned. I don't even know what to say. I feel like I should be free to do as I please.

40304.「おお！ それは 神秘の水！\n ありがとうございます！\n 本当に ありがとう:
Oh! That's Sacred Water! Thank you! Thank you so much! Now I can perform baptism! I'll finally be a priest! Oh. I see it now. My
mission, which I couldn't see when I was a cook. Now I can do what I want. This is my thanks. Please accept it.

40305.「そうだ。そういえば この町には\n 神父さんが もうひとりいたな。\n 後で:
That's right. Come to think of it, there is
another priest in this town. I'll have to go
say hello to him later.

40306.「そういえば この町には\n 神父さんが もうひとりいたな。\n 後で ごあいさ:
Come to think of it, there is another priest
in this town. I'll have to go say hello to him
later.

40307.「神父さまは この町の誇りですわ。\n 長年の ご奉仕が実を結び\n 町の方々も:
Father is the pride of this town. His many
years of service have borne fruit, and the
people of this town love him.

40308.「洗礼を済ませたから この町の神父さまに\n ごあいさつに 行ったんだよ。\n<:
I've been baptized, so I went to say hello to the priest in this town. I'm Hetchaffe, the new priest. He said he would take care of me
from now on. But I had a little concern. The priest gave his consent with all his heart, but the sisters beside him were looking at me.
Did I do something wrong?

40309.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「まさか 本当に:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>I never thought that he would really become a
priest. What our master is thinking is beyond
my comprehension.

40310.「ようこそ お越しくださいました。\n ……あなたは ウデが立つようですね。\n:
Welcome, welcome. You seem to have a knack for this. Actually, there's a problem. Listen to me for a moment. A poor cook named Hetchaffe
is trying to become a priest. That would leave two priests in this town. With two, one will inevitably become useless. I don't want to see
you lose your career that you have built up over the years. There is only one way to keep him in this town. We have to get results. A
big result that everyone will be satisfied with. So I've been thinking. If the priest breaks the curse of the one who is cursed, he
can keep his reputation, and he won't have to worry about being kicked out of town for the time being. And not just a curse, but
something more specific. Something that would make him unable to get up from his chair, or something with more impact. So I have a favor
to ask of you. I heard that there is a monster who uses a special curse in the southeast area of Orphea Region West. I would be very
grateful if you could head to that area and find out who is under such a particular curse.

40311.「まあ うれしい。ありがとうございます。\n<br>\n「イスから 立ち上がれな:
Well, I'm glad. Thank you very much. If you find someone who is under a special curse that prevents him or her from getting up from a
chair, please ring this Krakka. If I can hear the sound, I will come right away. Thank you very much.

40312.<pc>は シスター・プリミンから\nどこでもクラッカー（だいじなもの）を\n受:
<pc> received an Anywhere Cracker
(Key Item) from Sister Purimin!<me 60>

40313.「まあ うれしい。ありがとうございます。\n お気持ちは うれしいのですが……。:
Well, I'm glad. Thank you very much. I'm glad to hear that. But you seem to be full of other people's requests. It's natural to give a
helping hand to those in need. Please put them first.

40314.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「そうですか……。そ:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I see. That is unfortunate. I guess I'll have
to go looking for it myself.

42175.<pc>は\nどこでもクラッカーを 鳴らそうとした。\n<br>\nしかし 呪わ:
<pc> tried to ring Anywhere Cracker.
But we can't ring it where the damned are not!

40315.「神父さまが 呪われている方の呪いを解けば\n 名声を保てるから 町から追いださ:
I believe that if a priest can break a curse on someone, he can keep his good name and not worry about being run out of town. If you find
someone under a particular curse that prevents them from getting up from their chair, please ring the Anywhere Cracker.

40316.「オルフェア地方西の 南東辺りには\n 特殊な呪いを使う魔物が いると聞きます。:
I heard that there is a monster who uses a special curse in the southeast area of Orphea Region West. There might be someone who is
cursed.

40317.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「あなたには お:
You've been a great help to me. If word gets out, Father's position will be secure. You won't be driven out of town. This is my way of
saying thank you.

40318.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「あなたには お:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>You've been a great help to me. If word gets
out, Father's position will be secure. You
won't be driven out of town.

69834.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr><turn_pc:
Damn Pakul. Just when I thought he'd finally come out of hiding, he goes into cloud cover again! Don't think you can just walk away from
the money you owe me! Next time I see him, I'm gonna grab him and rip every hair out of his ass!

40319.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr><turn_pc:
Mr. Baro ate all of my food! This is love! It's love! It's love! I'm going to make a fierce approach and end up getting married
right away! I'm going to go for it! I'm going straight for it!

69835.<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>「なんかぁー。し:
What's going on? It seems that Pakul, a regular customer who has been gone for a while, has come back. He has a terrible
drinking habit and always pays for his drinks. To be honest, I'm not sure if he's still here.

40320.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「私 この前 神:
I made my debut as a priest the other day. For the first time in my life, I preached God's teachings to the people of this town. I
wouldn't have become a priest if they hadn't sold out of Pukupuku Peach. Perhaps it was God's guidance.

40321.「神の お告げとか ありがたい教えとか\n 主人は 一日中そんなことを言ってます:
I'm glad to hear that you are doing well, even though you talk all day long about ''God's oracle'' and ''thankful teachings. When you said
you were going to quit being a chef, you were really depressed. The best thing is that you are doing well.

40322.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「神父さまが 呪:
Rumors that Father has broken the curse seem to be spreading smoothly. Hmm. Now I can rest easy. Now, even if Hetchaffe grows in
strength, he will never surpass Father's fame. This match. We got it.

198970.いくつかの木箱が 無造作に置かれている。\n特に 気になるものは 見つからなかっ:
Several crates were randomly placed. I didn't
find anything of particular interest.

48133.「こんな裏通りにあるもんだから\n 親父から受け継いだ ボクの鍛冶屋も\n お客:
Because it's located on this alleyway, my blacksmith shop, which I inherited from my father, doesn't get many customers. But you
know what? The circus that is so popular now used to be a cake shop on alleyway. There's a secret to that success. Mr. Nablette, who was
a cake maker at that time, got an oven from Pipzer, a legendary cake maker, and perfected it. He said that every tool Pipzer made had
magic in them, and that if you used them, everything would turn out well! So, I would like to ask Pipzer, who lives in a cabin in
Muruel Forest, to make me a magic tool too.

48135.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「わーい ありが:
Wow, thank you! I really wanted to ask you myself, but I was afraid of the monster in the forest, so I couldn't go. I'll be sure to
return the favor, so please do.

48136.「わーい ありがとう！ でも 見たところ\n たくさんの仕事を 抱えているみたい:
Wow, thanks! But from the looks of it, you've
got a lot of work on your plate. Come back
when you're free.

48527.「そう……。自分で行けって 言うんだろ？\n でも ミュルエルの森に出る 魔物が:
Yeah. You want me to go by myself, right? But
I'm too scared of the monsters in Muruel
Forest to go by myself.

48137.「伝説の職人ピプゼールに 魔法の道具を\n 作ってもらえれば 親父から受け継いだ:
If I can get the legendary Pipzer to make me a magic tool, I'm sure my blacksmithing business, which I inherited from my father,
will be a success.

48138.<close_irai>「ピプゼールは ミュルエルの森の小屋に\n 住んでいるか:
<close_irai>Pipzer lives in the cabin of Muruel Forest, so
go ask him to make you some kind of magic
tool.

48139.「おかえり！ どうだった？\n ピプゼールは 魔法の道具を作ることを\n 引き受:
Welcome back! How'd it go? Did Pipzer take on the task of creating the magical tool? What? He told you that he can't make magic and that
he didn't put the spell on the oven? Oh, no.

48140.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「ナブレットさんには:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Why can't Nablette make The Magic Oven and I
can't make my tools? That's not right! You're
wrong.

48141.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「この写真は……:
Is this a photo of Nablette in her younger days? So that's The Magic Oven in the back. Nablette is sooty and true black. And he
doesn't look like he's using The Magic Oven with his desperate face.

48733.<icon_exc>「そっか……。オーブンに魔法をかけたのは\n ピプゼールじゃ:
I see. So it wasn't Pipzer who put the magic in the oven. Nablette's success at the cake shop was not because of magic, but because she
wanted to succeed and worked hard. In other words, it was Nablette herself who enchanted the oven. I'm sorry you had to go all the way
to Muruel Forest. Here, take it as a thank- you.

48142.オーブンの古い写真を\nレポッチに 渡しますか？<yesno><close>:
Would you like to give Old Oven Photograph to
Repotchi?<yesno><close>

48143.<pc>は レポッチに\nオーブンの古い写真を 渡した！:
<pc> gave Old Oven Photograph to
Repotchi!

48144.「ナブレットさんが 成功したのは\n 魔法のオーブンのチカラなんかじゃなくて\n:
Nablette's success was not the result of The Magic Oven, but of her own efforts. And yet, I'm ashamed of myself for believing in
Nablette's shy, fictional story about The Magic Oven. One day, I too aim to become a craftsman who is rumored to be using magic
tools. I'll rebuild the blacksmith shop I inherited from my father!

48386.「広場にある オルフェア名物 ビッグホルンは\n 今でこそ ただの 大きな置物じ:
Orphea's famous Big Horn in the plaza is now
just a big figurine, but it used to be very
popular among children.

48387.「おお そうか。引き受けてくれるか！\n やってきてくれたら わしが お前さんに:
Oh, yeah. Will you accept? If you come, I'll
do something nice for you.<bw_break>

48388.「いやはや 管理人のわしが ヒザを悪くして\n ホルンの掃除が できなくなったせ:
Well, I, the janitor, have been unable to clean the horn because of my bad knee, and the inside of the pipe has become rusty. I was in
trouble, and you came to me. What a Drang boy I am! Well then, I'm glad to meet you! Capi...

48390.「そうか そうか！ 気持ちは うれしいんじゃが\n お前さん 今 他の人からの頼:
I see. I see! I'm glad you feel that way, but you must have your hands full with other people's requests, don't you? I'm sure you
have your hands full with other people's requests right now, don't you?

48391.「そっ そうか。残念じゃのう。\n お前さんなら…… と思ったんじゃがのう。\n:
Oh, I see. That's too bad. I thought you would
be the one. It's a shame, really.

50457.<icon_exc>「ふぬっ！ ここに うってつけの人物が……。\n ちょいと:
Hmm! Here's just the man for the job. Hey, can you do the poor old man a favor? First of all, I want you to get Pom Pom Oil, which is rarely
found after defeating <%sev_que_name0> in Underground Lake Cave, Wena Islands. Pom Pom Oil is an all-purpose oil that can kill any
rust stain! It's an all-purpose oil. Go use it to clean the bighorns. And when you're done, please tell me if Big Horn has come back to
life. Fuffupu, a lifetime wish please

48392.「ポムポムオイルは ウェナ諸島にある\n 地底湖の洞くつの <%sEV_QUE_:
Pom Pom Oil is a rust remover rarely obtained
by killing <%sev_que_name0> at Underground
Lake Cave in the Wena Islands.<open_irai><bw_break>

48393.「お前さんには そのオイルを使って\n ビッグホルンの 掃除をしてきてほしいんじ:
I want you to go use that oil to clean the big
horn. Fuffupu will cry if you don't!<bw_break>

48394.「掃除が終わって ビッグホルンが\n 息を吹き返したかどうか しらべてきてくれた:
If you could get back to me when you're done
cleaning up and see if Big Horn has come back
to life, I'll do you a favor.

48396.「ふごっ！ お前さんが持ってるのは\n ポムポムオイルじゃな！<open_ira: Gosh! That's Pom Pom Oil you're holding!<open_irai><bw_break>

48397.「手に入れたなら そのオイルを使って\n ビッグホルンの掃除をして ホルンが\n:
If it's received, I'd like you to use the oil
to clean the big horn and see if the horn came
back to life!<bw_break>

48398.「ちゃんと 最後まで やってきてくれたら\n お前さんに いいこと してあげるか:
I'll do something good for you if you come
through to the end! I'll do something nice for
you if you do it right to the end!

48400.巨大なホルンが そびえ立っている。\n<br>\nポムポムオイルを使って\nビッ:
A huge horn stands tall. Would you like to
clean the big horn with Pom Pom Oil?<yesno><close>

48401.<pc>は ポムポムオイルを使って\nビッグホルンの サビ汚れを落とした。\n<:
<pc> used Pom Pom Oil to remove rust
stains from the big horn. Now the big horn is
clean and ready to use!

48402.「ん？ お前さん そのスッキリとした顔は……\n ビッグホルンの掃除をしてきてく:
Hmm? You, you're looking refreshed. You've cleaned Big Horn, haven't you? But, but..! I guess you haven't checked to see if Big Horn
has come up for air yet.

48403.「ちゃんと しらべてから 来てほしいんじゃ。\n 最後まで やってくれなきゃ い:
I want you to do your research before you
come. If you don't finish, I can't do anything
good for you. So I beg you.

48405.ビッグホルンを 使いますか？<yesno><close>: Would you like to use the Big Horn?<yesno><close>

48406.「おおっ！ お前さんの 見事な飛びっぷり。\n ここから しかと 見ておったぞ！:
Oh, wow! You've done a fine job of flying. I've been watching you from here! Thank you. Thanks for your hard work. What? I thought you
said it was an instrument? The Big Horn is a marks action that makes people who enter it fly far away from it. If word gets out that
Orphea's specialty has been fixed, it will be a lively spot where people gather to play with the big horn again.

48407.「どれ さっそく ビッグホルン復活のウワサを\n あることないこと 流さなければ:
I'm going to have to start spreading rumors of Bighorn's return right away. We're going to be very busy! What? What good thing did you
promise me? What is the good thing you promised? You're quite the goofball, aren't you? I've fixed your bighorn so you can have a
blast. That's the best thing you could have done.

48408.「なぬっ？ ビッグホルンが直ったのは\n 自分が ポムポムオイルをゲットして\n:
What? You think the bighorn was fixed because you got some Pom Pom Oil and cleaned it up? Well, it's not impossible to say that, but
don't worry about the little things. Have a heart as big as a bighorn! Big horns are always available. Whenever you want to fly
from the east side of town to the west side of town, or when you just want to blow your mind! By all means, use it with gusto.

48411.「わしも さっそく ビッグホルンで\n 以前のように 飛びまくりたいんじゃが\n:
I want to start flying with the Big Horn as soon as possible, but first, I need to fix my knee. I tried to make a big landing on the
bighorn before, but I failed and fell down, hurting my knee. My brother, who is the chief of Pukulet Village, would laugh at me for
being so pathetic. He is dancing all over the place. When you use the Big Horn, don't get carried away and do a triple-turn while
landing on the ground! Aita-ta-ta-ta.

61164.「おめえ 称号って知ってるか？ 称号ってのは\n 付けてる人の 人とナリさ表すも:
You know what a title is, don't you? A title is an expression of one's personality. In this world, there are vast amounts of titles.
I want to see as many different titles as I can. Hey, you. Can you show me the titles you've collected sometime?
I wanna see the title my late grandma wore when I was little, a title called ''First-Class Collector''.

61167.「見せてくれるだか？ ありがとな！\n 一流コレクターの称号を かたがきにした状:
You're gonna show me? Thanks! Once you've got the ''First-Class Collector'' title equipped, talk to me again, pretty please.
Titles can be equipped in the ''Records'' menu with the button.
The ''First-Class Collector'' title is one given to those who collect an unbelievable amount of items, it seems.
And if you equip the title, that'll make it to where everyone will be able see it.
My grandma was a first-class collector too, and she used to march around town with the wind at her back.
Aah, I miss her... Grandma and I holding hands made me feel so proud...
Oops, I've gone on too much talking about myself. How embarrassing, forget what I just said! Well, I'll be waiting for you to show me the title!

61169.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「見せてくれるだ:
You're gonna show me?... But you seem to have a lot of other people's requests.
Then when you've finished the others' request come see me again, pretty please!

61170.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「見せてくれねえって:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>You say that you won't show me it? And there's nothing
I can do about it!?... Can't be helped, can it. If
you change your mind, come back again, pretty please!

61215.「オラが見てえのは 一流コレクターって\n 称号さ 付けてる人だべ。かたがきに\:
I wanna see the title called ''First-Class Collector''.
Once you've got the ''First-Class Collector'' title equipped, talk to me again, pretty please.
Titles can be equipped in the ''Records'' menu with the button.
The ''First-Class Collector'' title is one given to those who collect an unbelievable amount of items, it seems.
And if you equip the title, that'll make it to where everyone will be able see it.
My grandma was a first-class collector too, and she used to march around town with the wind at her back.
Aah, I miss her... Grandma and I holding hands made me feel so proud...
Oops, I've gone on too much talking about myself. How embarrassing, forget what I just said! Well, I'll be waiting for you to show me the title!

61207.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr><icon_ex:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr><icon_exc>Th-that's the title...!! That's the ''First-Class
Collector'' title, isn't it! The same title as
Grandma's!<bw_break>

61208.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「そこはかとない:
I feel a faint bit of pride. Grandma must've been a woman of a higher caliber!
Ha, as a First-Class Collector, there's a certain air about you... I'm completely overwhelmed.
Little me didn't appreciate just how great a First- Class Collector was, but now...
I've seen all kinds of titles in my time, so I get it. How hard you and Grandma had to work to obtain that title...
Thanks to you, I feel like I know a little bit more about Grandma. Thanks! Here's this as thanks.

61209.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「はー やっぱり:
Ha, I knew it; titles are good things. It's so romantic! I want to see even more titles.
You should get even more titles and show them to all kinds of people. I know that you'll be able to travel with pride!

61212.「称号さ持ってる人は みんな立派な人たちだべ。\n オラ ますます 称号さ好きに:
People with titles are all respectable individuals. I've started liking titles more and more. I want to see even more titles.
You should get even more titles and show them to all kinds of people. I know that you'll be able to travel with pride!

84505.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ふんわり とろ:
I'm Poshel, the new master of the Cooking Guild, Cooking Angel! Your name is ! What a delicious name! If you
cook it hard, it will be a good cook! This is a Cooking Guild that makes cooking items!When you eat a cooking item, your power and HP will
increase for a certain amount of time! Above all, when you eat a delicious dish, you'll feel happy! So, why don't you become a Cook
too? I'd like to say ''Why don't you become a cook too?'' but right now we're not recruiting new cooks. I'm still a rookie, so I'm on a
recruiting freeze until I get used to working as a master with a little more experience. But you're free to visit the guild, so by all
means, please take a look around! I'd be very happy if you could buy some of my pride and joy.

84527.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「クッキング☆エ:
Cooking Angel Poshel has been working very hard to reopen the Cooking Guild!Poshel worked so hard to reopen the Cooking Guild! I admired
her so much that I became a Cook.

84528.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「……おいしそう:
Can you smell the delicious aroma? Welcome to the Cooking Guild, where you can fill your stomach and smile! Cooking Guild's motto is
''Delicious, full of dreams, and safe! That's why we also have to check the quality of our food. We also have our own accountant, who is
in charge of the guild's finances, and he spares no expense when it comes to food safety. That is Cookin' Nguyen Gel's policy!

201238.「オルフェア来たなら よっといで～。\n アクロバットケーキ屋だよ～。\n<br:
If you're in Orphea, come on in! We are Acrobatic Cake shop! We are now selling our new Acro Bat bread cake exclusively at our
store. It's very popular and if you don't buy it soon, it might be sold out! Oh, maybe you're here to buy one of our bread cakes?

201239.<icon_exc>「……って 思ったけど ありゃりゃのりゃ～。\n パンケーキ:
I thought, ''Oh no, no, no, no! There's only one bread cake left! People wearing big glasses came in one after another and bought
up all the breadcakes. But once they're gone, I can close up store and give them away for free. Here you go~.

201240.「ハチミツとかをつけて 食べたら\n きっと ほっぺた 落っこちるよ～。\n ご:
I bet if you dip them in honey or something,
your cheeks will fall off! Try it~!

201242.「オルフェア来たなら よっといで～。\n アクロバットケーキ屋だよ～。\n<br:
If you're in Orphea, come on in! We are Acrobatic Cake shop! Our long-awaited new Acro Bat Bread Cake! If you pour honey on it, your
cheeks will fall off! But it sold out so fast, sorry.

69815.「ここねー 冒険者の酒場っていうのー。\n あなたって 冒険者でしょー？ それな:
This place is called the Adventurer's Tavern. You are an adventurer, right? If you are an adventurer, then you definitely need this
place. You can ask your friends to do quests for you in the request form. You can't miss out on this!

10163002.<pc>は\n女神の蒼銀石を わたされた！<se_nots System Ite: <pc> was given the Goddess' Blue Gem!<se_nots System Item>

52907.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「さ～てと レベ:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Now let's see, where is the strong kitty who
has reached level 50?

52908.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr><icon_ex:
Oh, excuse me. I'm looking for a top-notch adventurer. When you reach level 50 in any of the locations, if you're looking to take it to
the next level, come here. By the way, no private matters, please.

53853.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr><turn_pc:
It seems you are not ready for my ritual yet. You can come back here after you've completed Light Guide Benihina's ritual. I'll be
waiting for you.

52916.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr><turn_pc:
Haha, it's you, isn't it? The top-notch adventurer who reached level 50, . I heard about you from Holy Messenger Benihina.
My name is Seiken, and I thank fate that I met you. From here on, let's take care of each other.
...Weeell, even though you already know it, I gotta explain again; it's the rules. It'll just take a minute, so please bear with me.
Uuuummm, us Holy Messengers role in the service of the Six Saints is to elevate power-hungry adventurers, like you, to a even greater heights.
Sooo, if you want to take it to the next level, you'll have to undergo a little ritual... And undergo a mystical ceremony.

52917.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「んじゃ やるこ:
Well, let's do what needs to be done and take the weight off our shoulders. It'll be more relaxing if we get it done quickly.
So, how about we do a ceremony in front of the River of Light?
Oops, I almost forgot to give you this! This is a precious jewel called the Goddess' Blue Gem.

52919.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「キミにも 女神:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>You heard the voice of the Goddess, didn't you?
With that, the ritual is complete.

52920.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「そんじゃ 解放:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Well then, I have a little something good to tell you
who has completed the liberation ritual.<bw_break>

52921.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「アストルティ:
Behind every great battle in the history of Astoltia, there have always been strong ones led by the Six Saints.
Some were heroes of great renown, some were minor players, and some fell on the battlefields...
However, they all chose to give their lives for the mission of protecting this world. And now it's your generation's turn.
...Next, in Windmill Hill, at the southeastern well, pay a visit to Holy Messenger Kilpappo!

52928.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「次に待つ聖使者:
The next Light Guide waiting for you is a man named Kilpappo. He's in a well at Windmill Hill near Glitter Windmill Tower, Pukuland.
It'd be good to further devote yourself to training.

52929.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「もう キルパッ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>You've already completed Kilpappo's ritual, that's
surprising. I can't help you anymore, but I'll be
here to keep watch over your actions.

34977.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「キーエンブレム:
I came all the way here to get the key emblem, but I can't find the mayor of this town. I've asked the townspeople, but they just tell me
to go to the circus tent. What is going on here?

34978.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「ちっ……。\n:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>Damn. Where the hell did that bastard Pakul
run off to? The interest is due today.

37181.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr><turn_pc:
Hey! You! If you see a small, punk-ass Pukulipo wearing a coat named Pakul, tell him I'll cut his head off if he doesn't return my
money!

34979.「亡くなった メギストリス王国のお妃様は\n この町の出身なのよ。\n もともと:
The late Queen of Megistris was from this town. She was originally the daughter of a cake shop owner. What? That cake shop? It's
now called Navnav Grand Circus.

34980.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「オルフェアの町:
Town of Orphea is famous for its Nabunabu Circus. This time, they are going to put on a great show. It's a special show, so Orphea
residents or those with Proof of Adulthood may be allowed in. If you have Proof of Adulthood, go to the circus tent. It's the fancy tent up
the hill.

132307.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「オルフェアの町:
Town of Orphea is famous for its Nabunabu Circus. This time, they are going to put on a great show. It's a special show, so Orphea
residents or those with Proof of Adulthood may be allowed in. If you have Proof of Adulthood, go to the circus tent. It's the fancy tent up
the hill.

34981.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「子供たちが 出:
Thanks to the kids being out, I can spread my wings for the first time in a while. I'm going to do a lot of shopping today. What? The kids?
We went to see the Navnav Circus. They said that for the 15th anniversary of the circus, children in Orphea can see the show for free!

34982.<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>「よく酒場に来る:
This Pakul guy who often comes to the Tavern is really unbelievable. He would try to put my clothes on a garbage bag and say, ''I'm guilty
of rape and other crimes! He tries to put a garbage bag over my clothes.

34983.「まずしく さびれた町だった オルフェアを\n ここまで大きくしたのは 町長さ。:
The mayor of Orphea is the one who has made Orphea from a once deserted town to this. Since the mayor started the Nabunabu Circus,
tourists have been pouring in. The mayor, no, the mayor is the town's benefactor.

34984.「ここは オルフェアの町です。\n ここまで来るのは 大変だったでしょう。\n:
This is the Town of Orphea. It must have been hard work to get here. Please take your time to look around the town. You can register as a
friend at the tavern. There is also a Vocation Priest. The tavern is located just north of Traveler's Bazaar on the street that leads to
the tunnel. There is a Travel Concierge at the inn who can provide you with various services. You can register by talking to the information
desk. Once you have had a chance to look around the town, you should be able to solve the town's problems. If the enemies are
strong, you can try leveling up or changing jobs. If you have a Rail Pass, you can take the train to other continents. I heard that
passes are rarely available. And if you have something to tell us, please wipe your wipe in pink.dark reddish purplePlease talk to them when you see them! If you find one, please talk to him or her!

61582.「ここは オルフェアの町です。\n ここまで来るのは 大変だったでしょう。\n:
This is the Town of Orphea. It must have been hard work to get here. Let me tell you something. If you have something to tell
someone, they're right over there, just like Mr. Hapopo, with the pink wipeout and the pink wipeout.dark reddish purpleI'm sure you'll be able to find a way to get in touch with Hapopo. Why don't you go talk to Mr. Hapopo right away? Look, it's just down
the street.

130575.「ここは オルフェアの町です。ここを出ると\n オルフェア地方東で 東に進むとポ:
This is the Town of Orphea. After leaving here, you will find Orphea Region East, Popola Region to the east, and Pukulet Region further
to the east. Orphea Region East is where the weaker monsters around the Town of Orphea live. If you want to start training, this side
is the best place. Oh, by the way, the tavern in this town is in a rather obscure location, so let me tell you something else. The tavern
is just north of here, down the street from Traveler's Bazaar, and into the tunnel. And if you have something to tell me, please wipe
your lips with the color pink.dark reddish purplePlease talk to them when you see them! If you find one, please talk to him or her!

130576.「ここは オルフェアの町です。ここを出ると\n オルフェア地方東で 東に進むとポ:
This is the Town of Orphea. After leaving here, you will find Orphea Region East, Popola Region to the east, and Pukulet Region further
to the east. Orphea Region East is where the weaker monsters around the Town of Orphea live. If you want to start training, this side
is the best place. Oh, by the way, the tavern in this town is in a rather obscure location, so let me tell you something else. The tavern
is just north of here, down the street from Traveler's Bazaar, and into the tunnel. And if you have something to tell someone, he or she
is over there, like Hapopo, with a pink wipe- off.dark reddish purpleI'm sure you'll be able to find a way to get in touch with Hapopo. Why don't you go talk to Mr. Hapopo right away? Look, it's just down
the street.

34985.「ああ ナブナブ大サーカスだったら\n あそこに見える へんちくりんな建物さ……:
Yeah, if it's the Navnav Grand Circus, you can see it over there, the weird building. What? You didn't ask me that? Sorry, sorry. I'm
sorry, I just answered as I always do, since all travelers to Orphea come here for the circus.

34986.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ほんと ナブレ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Mr. Nablette is a wonderful mayor, isn't he?
Inviting all the kids in town to the circus
for free! It's really tubby.

44087.「お客さん。こっちは 楽屋口だよ。\n ナブナブ大サーカスが 見たいなら\n 反:
Sir, this is the backstage entrance. This is the backstage entrance. If you want to see the Nabunabu Circus, go around to the other side
of the door!

34987.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「ナブレット団長:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>Captain Nablette is still single at a very old
age. I wonder if she's ever going to get
married.

34988.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「ナブレット団長:
Captain Nablette has enrolled a boy who lost his parents in his circus troupe. His name is Pudin from Pukulet Village. I wonder if he's
going to be the next in line for the circus troupe?

34989.「ここから出ると オルフェア地方西です。\n オルフェア地方東よりも 手強い魔物:
After leaving this area, you will find yourself in Orphea Region West. There are many more powerful monsters than in Orphea Region
East. If you go further southwest, you will reach Windmill Way, where there are many powerful monsters. It is best to go there
after you have had enough training.

34991.「悪いねえ お客さん。今回は特別公演だから\n オルフェアの人間しか 観れないん:
Sorry, my dear guests. This is a special show,
so you can only see Orphea's human. Give it up
for now. Come back next time!

34992.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「本日のナブナブ:
Today's Nabunabu Grand Circus is a special performance! It's a special Sho for Orphea residents only! What a surprise, children are
invited for free! Hmm? What's up, traveler? You have Proof of Adulthood, so you want the key emblem. The mayor of this town is Lord
Commander Nablette, but he's in the middle of a performance. Well, you can go in, but wait until the circus is over, then ask the
Commander for the key emblem.

34993.「悪いねえ お客さん。今回は特別公演だから\n オルフェアの人間しか 観れないん:
Sorry, my dear guests. This is a special show, so you can only see Orphea's ''human''. Unless you have Proof of Adulthood or something. Give
it up for now. Come back next time!

34994.「私は 世界中の魔瘴を 調査するため\n 連れの者と 旅をしておる。\n<br>:
I am traveling with a companion to investigate demon miasma around the world. Do monsters gather where demon miasma appear, or do evil
monsters call demon miasma to them? To find out, I am traveling around the world by order of King Kamiharmui.

48476.「旅人さん。知ってるかな？\n 光の河っていうのは この橋の下に広がっている\n:
Traveler. Do you know what it is? The River of Light is the rift in the earth that spreads out beneath this bridge and emits light. The
River of Light is not only here in Orphea, but in many places in Astoltia, but we don't know what's at the bottom. It's scary because it's
shining like it's cutting through the earth, but I don't see anything wrong with this beautiful scenery.

34995.「わが故郷 エルトナ大陸でも\n この プクランド大陸と 同じように\n あちこ:
In my hometown, Eltona Continent, demon miasma is appearing here and there, just like in Pukuland Continent. It seems to me that a
great dark power is trying to cover the world.

34996.「いらっしゃい。\n ……うん？ 買い物なら\n カウンターの前からに しておく:
Come on in. Yeah? If you want to shop, do it
from in front of the counter.

48858.「素材屋は 妹のポピールに まかせて\n コイン屋に 専念することにしたんだ。\:
I've decided to leave the Material Shop to my sister Popil and concentrate on the Coin Shop. Oh, and if you want to shop, you can do it
from in front of the counter!

150190.「あらら。迷子になっちゃったのかしら？\n お買い物がしたいなら\n カウンター:
Oops. I'm lost, aren't I? If you want to shop,
just talk to me from the counter.

48734.「いらっしゃい。\n ……うん？ 買い物なら\n カウンターの前からに しておく:
Come on in. Yeah? If you want to shop, do it
from in front of the counter.

34997.<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>「やけに サーカ:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>I wonder why the circus tent is so much
noisier than the other one. If it's that
interesting, I'll go see it sometime.

34998.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「聞いたわよ。ナ:
I heard that Captain Nablette lured the children to the circus tent and kidnapped them! That's just diabolical! God, please give
this Nablette guy a good whuppin'!

34999.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「ナブナブ大サーカス:
I heard that some kids were kidnapped while watching the Nabunabu Circus. Hmm? How do I know? Because they were sneaking a peek at the
circus through a crack in the circus tent!

35000.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「どうして あたしの:
<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>Why has my child been kidnapped? What has she
done? Oh, please be safe.

35001.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「さっき パクレ:
Mr. Pakul just came in and told me that our child was kidnapped by Captain Nablette. How could the mayor of Orphea kidnap a child?
Nablette! I won't forgive you!

35002.「なんだよ そんなにあわてて。\n えっ？ サーカスの団長を見なかったかって？\:
What's the matter? You're in such a rush.
What? Have you seen the circus leader? No, he
didn't come this way.

35003.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「あの ナブレット団:
<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>There is no way that Captain Nablette would
kidnap a child. But Mr. Pakul saw it with his
own eyes! What's going on?

44088.「お客さん。こっちは 楽屋口だよ。\n 団員たちが休憩中だから 静かにな。:
Sir, this is the backstage entrance. This is
the backstage exit. The group is taking a
break, so be quiet.

35004.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「サーカステント:
I thought I heard a scream from the circus tent, and then Mr. Pakul came out with a big fuss, but what happened? Captain Nablette took
the kids? Then those screams were my children's screams! My child has been kidnapped too!

35005.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「ナブレット団長さん:
<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>I can't believe Captain Nablette took the
kids. Oh, I wonder if my kids are safe.

35006.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「まさか あんな奇術:
I never thought he would use such magic to wipe out both himself and his children. I wonder what happened to the Commander. We
can't hold the circus if things continue like this, but now's not the time to be thinking about that. The group members in the backstage
area behind the circus tent might know something about the group leader. I'll ask them later.

35007.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「事件が 解決するま:
Until the case is solved, the Nabunabu Circus is closed. I wonder what's wrong with the head of the troupe that he used such magic to wipe
out both himself and his children.

35008.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「聞いたぞ。ナブ:
I heard that a ruffian named Nablette has kidnapped all the children in Orphea. What a wicked Pukulipo! I'll break his neck if I find
him!

35009.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「さっき ナブレ:
Captain Nablette just popped out from behind the circus tent like the wind! He was heading west! I tried to catch him, but he was so
quick, I lost him in the blink of an eye! Damn it~! By the way, we're on the east side! West is the other way, so be careful!

35010.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「ナブレットのヤ:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>Nablette's just walked through here! He must
be a real scumbag to kidnap all the kids in
town!

35011.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「やっぱり ナブ:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>I knew it! Captain Nablette took my baby! I
saw him! I saw the Commander leave town with
Pudin, who was crying!

35012.「あれれ？ 見まちがえたかな。\n ナブレット団長が 楽屋の方へ\n 向かってい:
Oh, no? I must have misjudged. I thought I saw
Captain Nablette heading towards the
backstage.

35013.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「さっき ナブレ:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>I saw a guy who looked like Nablette running
on this bridge just now. I wonder if he is
still in this town.

35014.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「見たか！ あの:
Did you see it? That horrible monster! Nablette, you've really outdone yourself with such a small body to stand up to a monster!
Well, here's your chance. If we go to Muruel Forest and defeat the monster, we'll get the key emblem for sure! I think Muruel Forest is
located at the west exit of Orphea Region West, further west! We've got to get there as soon as possible!

35015.「神様…… 天国の アルウェ王妃様……\n どうか ナブレット団長さんを\n 悪:
Dear God, Queen Alwe in heaven, please protect Captain Nablette from the hands of the Duke Sigras. Oh, of course you can protect me from
Duke Sigras.

35016.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「あの悪魔ザイガ:
That Duke Sigras said something strange about signing a contract with Alwe. Speaking of Alwe, what does the late queen who married
into Megistris from Orphea have to do with the demon? I heard that the demon is in Muruel Forest. This is the east side, so if you want
to go to the forest, take the west exit.

35017.「さっき オルフェア地方西を歩いてたら\n ナブレット団長と 会ったぜ。\n<b:
I just met Captain Nablette while walking in Orphea Region West. He mentioned something about going to Silver Hill to pick up the
kids, but I wonder if the Sigras thing has been taken care of yet.

35018.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「う うちの子……本:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>Is my baby really safe? I don't mean to pick
on the Commander, but he's dealing with such a
horrible monster!

35019.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「やってくれるじ:
You've done it, Mr. Mayor. Outsmarting the monsters all by yourself. And with such a graceful way of carrying himself! I can't help
but fall in love with you.

35020.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「オレたちは バカだ:
We're idiots, aren't we? Captain Nablette had a good reason for kidnapping the children. But how did the Commander know that Duke Sigras
was going to attack the children? It's a mystery when I think about it.

35021.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ほんと ナブレ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Mr. Nablette is a wonderful mayor. Protecting
all the children in the town from the terrible
monster! You really have courage.

44148.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「悪魔ザイガス…: <attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>Duke Sigras! But Captain Nablette was cool.

35022.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「あんな おそろしい:
I can't believe that such a horrible monster would appear. If my child hadn't been kidnapped, he might have killed her. The
Commander must have known what was going on, and took our child for the good of everyone in the town. Please, Commander, stay safe!

35023.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「ナブレット団長は:
Captain Nablette took the bait and tried to protect the town and the children? Damn, that makes me cry! All right! I'll take over here
and you go after the Commander and take down Duke Sigras in Muruel Forest!

35024.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「ナブレット団長は:
Captain Nablette took the bait and tried to protect the town and the children? Damn, that makes me cry! I'll protect the Nabunabu
Circus! Not a single mouse is allowed in the circus tent until the leader returns safely!

35025.「私は 世界中の魔瘴を 調査するため\n カミハルムイ王の命により\n 連れの者:
I am traveling with my companions by order of King Kamiharmui to investigate demon miasmas around the world. Who would have thought that
such a monster would appear even inside a town? Is this also due to the influence of demon miasma?

35026.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「町に現れた 悪:
A monster named Duke Sigras has appeared in town and is clad in tremendous evil power. Before the monster returns, I must hurry back
to Kamiharmui and inform my king of this great event!

35027.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「なにィッ！？:
What? You! You beat the monster, while I am left to fend for myself! Ugh... I was wrong! It can't be helped. I'll give the key emblem
to you.You're quicker than you look.

35028.「いいのいいの お礼なんて！\n 私は 当たり前のことを しただけよ。\n<br:
No need to thank me! I was only doing the obvious. It's because I prayed to God that a weak traveler like you was able to defeat such
a scary monster. But you know what, anyone would have done the same thing in a situation like that. So don't worry about thanking me.

35029.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「オレも もうち:
If I were a little stronger, I would have been able to help you guys out. Anyway, I'm glad you're safe. Now, go to the circus tent and
show your face to everyone. The whole town is waiting for your return.

35030.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「そりゃあ 魔物:
Well, thank you for saving me from the monster, but my little girl scraped her knee on the way back from Silver Hill! I can't
believe you would hurt your precious child. Captain Nablette, you are terrible, aren't you?

35031.「うちの子も 町中の子供たちも\n 団長さんが 連れて帰ってきてくれたんだ。\n:
Our boy and all the kids in town were brought home by the leader of the group. He is Orphea's benefactor. He even invited us to the
circus for free to make up for disturbing the whole town! I really bow down to the leader.

35032.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「よう！ 聞いた:
Yo! I heard! I heard you beat Duke Sigras. You did it! Thanks to you, the kids are back! With the Commander too, of course! Good, good,
good! They should all be at the circus tent. You should go there, too!

44090.「お客さん。こっちは 楽屋口だよ。\n ナブナブ大サーカスが 見たいなら\n 反:
Sir, this is the backstage entrance. This is the backstage entrance. If you want to see the Nabunabu Circus, go around to the other side
of the door!

35033.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「あたしの子供が:
My child is back! Of course, with the other kids and Pudin Boy from the circus. Thanks to Captain Nablette, everyone is safe. I'm so
glad he's the mayor!

35034.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「さあさあ！ オ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Come on, come on! To celebrate the return of
peace to Orphea, we have a special performance
by the Great Nabunabu Circus! Come and see it!

35035.「私は 世界中の魔瘴を 調査するため\n カミハルムイ王の命により\n 連れの者:
I am traveling with my companions by order of King Kamiharmui to investigate demon miasmas around the world. I heard that Queen Alwe, who
once made a pact with Duke Sigras, had the power of prophecy. If her were alive today, I would have asked her to show me the way out of
the demon miasma and the evil that is creeping into Astoltia.

35036.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「遅いわね イナ:
You're late Inaniwa, if you don't hurry Duke Sigras will come back. We have to get out of here as soon as possible! Did you defeat
Sigras? Did you? Really? Really? Then there's no need to leave in haste. Then there's no need to rush out. Let's continue our
investigation.

35037.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「ナブナブ大サー:
I am the Nabunabu Circus, and I am the props man, and I am the tout, Master Gigarde! Come on! Poor travelers! Gather round the circus
tent!

35038.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr><turn_pc:
Damn. Where the hell is that bastard Pakul hiding in the clouds? The repayment date has long passed! If I don't do something, the boss
will break my horn. Damn Pakul! I want my money back!

35039.「メギストリス王と 亡くなった お妃様は\n 結婚するまで 一度も会ったことが\:
King Megistris and the late queen had never met before they were married! My grandma told me that she was just a town girl when all of a
sudden the king came for her.

35040.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「子供の頃 ナブ:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>When I was a kid, Captain Nablette used to
hang out at Silver Hill with his sister Alwe.
Alwe was so cute. Oh, my God, it was so sweet.

35041.「子供たちったら 毎日 ナブナブ大サーカスを\n 観にいくのよ。大きくなったら\:
The kids go to see the Nabunabu Circus every
day. They want to be circus performers when
they grow up!

35042.<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>「よく酒場に来て:
Pakul, who used to come to the tavern often, is gone. I've been made to pay for the tavern. I'm Kunai Kusshi, but isn't this called a
crime or something? It's really impossible.

35043.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「オルフェアは:
Orphea is a fun town, but the City of Megistris is kind of a cushy place. I think a town shows the personality of the people who
rule it.

35044.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「オルフェア名物:
Orphea's famous Nabunabu Circus Troupe is in that weird building! You can enjoy the wonderful performance of Captain Nablette, the
hero who saved the children of Orphea, and delicious Acrobatic Cake!

35045.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ほんと ナブレ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Nablette is a wonderful mayor. He protects the
town from monster, and he lets us see his
wonderful circus. I really admire him.

44149.「お客さん。こっちは 楽屋口だよ。\n ナブナブ大サーカスが 見たいなら\n 反:
Sir, this is the backstage entrance. This is the backstage entrance. If you want to see the Nabunabu Circus, go around to the other side
of the door!

35046.「ナブナブ大サーカスの団長さんが 面倒見ている\n プディンって男の子は 昔 サ:
The leader of the Nabunabu Grand Circus is taking care of a boy named Pudin, who is a memento of a circus performer who used to be
in the circus. He told me the other day that he dreams of becoming a circus performer like his parents when he grows up.

35047.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「はい いらっし:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Welcome, welcome, welcome! Nabunabu Grand
Circus Entrance is here! We have a lot of
exciting acts to show you!

126616.ただいま 改装中につき\n立ち入りはご遠慮ください。:
